data.eml:eml: Megatibicen n. gen., a new North American cicada genus (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadinae: Cryptotympanini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sanborn, Allen F., Heath, Maxine S. (2016): Megatibicen n. gen., a new North American cicada genus (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadinae: Cryptotympanini). Zootaxa 4168 (3): 577-582, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4168.3.10
